context: I HATE STEAM - it is as bad as YELP - is this the only way?
response: I could not agree more. STEAM is a useless middleman between you and the game. It rarely works, and is really aimed at the on-line multiplayer crowd. Why game developers like Creative Assembly have adopted it, I cannot say. But it is a requirement, and it is the only way.

context: Any ideas on what the special edition of the game contains?
response: Unfortunately, it only contains the game. I feel a little cheated, but at least this version of the game without the extra fluff is cheaper.

context: Do these work well for playing video games? Plan to use Bluetooth for music and the 3.5mm jack from the PS4 controller for gaming.
response: These headphones work great for listening to music and watching movies. But about playing games it depends on the game you want to play.I tried these for playing counter strike on my pc. But didnt find them great for playing games. I think you should go for gaming headset for gaming if you are a regular player.

context: Do you need a cable to plug it in to the Xbox, or does it plug in directly?
response: no  it plug in directly into your hard drive port on the side of your xbox

context: Does it work well?
response: Yes indeed it does, my 16 yr old is a computer and gaming geek, he loves it, its very sturdy and worth the money!!!

context: Does this come with a model plane? because the picture makes it look like that.
response: It's not a model plane... it's a plane unlock in the game.  Don't waste your money on this game... it's really not that good.  The stick is not too bad yet not the best I've used.  If you find really cheap then might be worth it.

context: Can you combine two (2) extension cables?
response: Yes! You can combine all four if your heart desires! Just make sure they're secured together tightly so that they don't fall out, and play gamecube from where ever you want.

context: does this game have local co-op or couch co-op? which ever means 2 players for you guys thats its not online...thanks
response: nope, it doesn't. Sorry Andy but No local co-op in this game.

context: Does it interfere with wi-fi?
response: I never turn off my receiver and it does not seem to mess with the wi-fi at all so my answer is NO it does not interfere with wi-fi.

context: Can I use the original Wii controllers (The ones that are NOT "plus controllers") with the Wii U?
response: Yes, Absolutely!  Now I am sure there are some games that you can't, that like require the tablet but each game tells you on the back cover of the box what controllers work with it.  But the system itself does allow classic Wii remote use.

context: i have xbox gold live but still cant log on to play garden war fare
response: We have had the same problem. I was told that it requires a lot of pull from the internet so if you have a weak signal strength at all then you will have a hard time playing it.

context: Why does this not work with American games?
response: Because that stupid Nintendo has region lock on all their game consoles. That means different region console can only play that region version games.

context: This or Super Smash Bros?
response: Both games are excellent.  They are totally different kinds of games.  If you are a solo player get zelda.  If you like to play with friends get Smash.  Also, although a very good game, zelda has low replay value compared to smash.

context: Can you download to WiiU console?  Our disc keeps freezing up.
response: I don't think you can. Your wii probably needs to be shut down or reset. When you open the cover there should be a red button just push it and it should reset the console. It shouldn't delete anything. If not then the disc needs to be cleaned.

context: mine blinks red when I plug in any controllers.  What does this mean.
response: Lighting up red is charging. Blinking red means bad battery pack.

context: Will these still fit snugly and not slip off easily if the original joystick cover has completely come off?

context: Is this stick durable? Can it tolerate stressful actions  like, trigger pulls under duress or a high anxiety turn?
response: You cant be a true tryhard with this joystick. The biggest problem you'll have is with your "high anxiety" turns due to the base not being weighted, the whole stick will likely flop over.
